item.title: [SPARK-19677] HDFSBackedStateStoreProvider fails to overwrite existing file
item.description:

User 'vitillo' has created a pull request for this issue:
https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/17012

Thank you for reporting this issue! I just wanted to add that we get the same HDFS error when we restart our structured streaming drivers but also when we try to run more complex driver using withWatermark/agg/groupBy/orderBy, we get in the first run without restart:
